DOC.brief_title: Intramuscular Lipid Insulin Action : Ethnic Aspects
DOC.criteria: Overweight , age 2150 year , Women must premenopausal , Normal glucose tolerance , weight stable least 6 month weight change great 5 lb . Exclusion criterion type 1 type 2 diabetes , polycystic ovarian disease , BMI < 26.5 weight > 300 pound , weight change > 5 pound last 6 month , regular exercise > 2 hour per week , pregnancy , currently breastfeed , cholesterol medication , disorder glucose lipid metabolism , use medication could affect body composition glucose metabolism ( include oral contraceptive blood pressure medication ) , current use tobacco , use illegal drug last 6 month , history hypoglycemic episode , major food allergy food dislike , woman inconsistent absence monthly menstrual cycle , medical history counterindicated inclusion study .
